Plotters¶

Plot with corner:¶

Plotter class¶

The Plotter class reads the chains to draw with the chosen option.

class py.Plotter.Plotter(outputname, chainsdir, samplername, ndim, truths, weights, plottername)[source]¶

This class make plots with getdist or corner.

cornerPlotter()[source]¶

Corner method.

cosmichPlotter()[source]¶

cosmich plotter method

getdistPlotter()[source]¶

Getdist method.

readFile()[source]¶

This method reads the samples and the .param file.

rootDirWithFile()[source]¶

Finds the path.

showFig()[source]¶

Displays the plots after the samples are generated.
